note.p: Surgeon. BA, Trinity College, Dublin, 1852. MRCS, 1852. Appointed assistant surgeon in the Indian Medical Service, 1856; surgeon, 1868; surgeon major, 1873; retired to Bristol in 1880. His eldest son was Thomas Travers Sherlock (1853–1916).
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966 (Ancestry.com, accessed 25 January 2017)

ref.hi: Roll of the Indian Medical Service
